title: S13 Ep20: Horror Finds A Home
itunes:title: Horror Finds A Home
description:
Horror finds a Home on today's BEYOND the DARKNESS with guest June Matthews.

In a period of just 6 weeks, the Matthews family moved, began new jobs & were living in a new state, and her husband was off on his first business trip. Now, alone in their strange new house, unexplained events began to happen. Never a believer in the paranormal, June searched for the stranger she believed was hiding inside her house. Slamming doors, moving things but, seemingly, able to come and go undetected.

PLUS an all new Theater of the Mind!

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Visit her site here: www.thereliving.com

www.DDPYoga.com change your life and save 20% thru January 2018
